body.name: Gotham Steel Air Fryer Basket for Convection Oven, 2 Piece Nonstick Copper Crisper Tray, Also Great for Baking & Crispy Foods, Dishwasher Safe – XXL 16.5” x 12.5”
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 37 mins
features: Durable Construction: Made from aluminum with a non-stick copper coating for long-lasting use.
Multipurpose Use: Great for baking, frying, roasting, and crisping foods.
Spacious Capacity: 3-quart size allows for preparing large meals.
Easy Cleaning: Dishwasher safe for quick and simple cleanup.
body.description: Gotham Steel Crisper Tray for Oven, 2 Piece Nonstick Copper Crisper Tray & Basket, Air Fry in your Oven, Great for Baking & Crispy Foods, Dishwasher Safe, As Seen on TV – XXL Family Size 16.5” x 12.5”Crisper Tray: The Gotham Steel 2 piece crisper tray and basket is the revolutionary air frying tray that you can use in your oven. The raised basket allows for the convection heat to reach every angle of the food and gives you the perfect crisp, without all the calories, every time! “Fry” French fries, tater tots, mozzarella sticks and so much moreGotham Steel Cookware: With over 30 million happy customers, Gotham Steel has revolutionized kitchens across the world with the introduction of the nonstick ceramic copper cookware! New for 2021, our frying pans have improved in every area including the nonstick coating, stay cool handles, exterior finish and durability, including infusing diamond-like particles to the surface to ensure the pan doesn’t scratch! Enjoy and welcome to the Gotham Steel family.Ultimate Ceramic Nonstick: The Gotham Steel nonstick cooking surface is coated three times and then reinforced with diamonds to deliver the ultimate food release. No seasoning or even oil or butter needed, makes for healthier eating, and provides for hassle free, 1-2-3 cleanup.Healthy & Non-Toxic: The Gotham Steel Ti-Cerama coating is free of PFOA, PFOS, lead & cadmium for a healthy and safe experience day in and out.Effortless Cleanup, Dishwasher Safe: Spend less time with cleanup! After all the cooking and prepping is done, place in the dishwasher for quick and easy cleanup.Oven Safe: Compatible with all ovens and can handle up to 400 degreesEven Heat Distribution: The aluminum composition and mesh basket ensures the convection heat reaches all areas of the food and provides great results.10 Year Guarantee: Our cookware is built for years of use and backed by a 10-year limited guarantee

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t know that I needed this pan, but now I cannot do without it. Makes my new oven features so much better. Air fry and convection! Things are crispy perfectly every time and clean up is easy too. I would definitely recommend this pan to anyone who asks. Also a good size for 2 or 3 people!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for the anova precision oven
reviews.reviewText: Switched out our decade old countertop oven with an anova precision oven to try and consolidate appliances. The 13.4” x 11.4” size fits and has been working well for the air fryer setting. It's been pretty non stick so far and easy to clean compared to some wire/roasting racks that I have also tried. Overall this seems like a good option for many of the ovens with air fryer function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works and easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: I got this to use in my convection oven / air fryer. So far it has worked well, been easy to use and clean. The tray is nice and the basket is a decent size. I am not sure how well the "coating" will last or how durable it will be in the long run, but the quality seems decent.I do wish the grid was a bit smaller / tighter (smaller holes) as some of the items I put in it tend to want to fall into the holes and / or stick in the holes.I would buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a must for "air frying" using the convection setting on the oven
reviews.reviewText: While the idea of a separate air fryer sounds appealing, the reality is that a stand-alone air fryer 1. it's too small for more than 1 person, and 2. it's not a small appliance - one needs to find a home for it when not using.I can't believe I didn't think of looking this up sooner. It's fantastic. I'm glad I purchased the larger size. The first meal we made was loaded zucchini skins (like potato skins but zucchini). Let me tell you - delicious!I laid a piece of foil in the bottom pan to catch any drippings, and sprayed the mesh with cooking spray - easy as pie to clean up. Knocked off some of the cheese that dripped and then everything got tossed in the dishwasher.Highly recommend if you're wanting to do some air frying using your convection oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really works. I’ve always thought air fryers were just small fan ovens with good baskets. Now I know it’s true. This basket and tray arrangement is much better at crisping oven cooked food than a conventional flat tray.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for family size air frying
reviews.reviewText: We bought a new oven that has the air fryer feature and need a large air fryer basket. We decided to try this and is an excellent choice. Holds lots food, super easy to clean and seems to be well constructed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for air frying
reviews.reviewText: Our wall oven has an air fryer setting. We use this when we want to air fry. Easy to use, and easy to clean after use. We use it often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Copper nonstick overrated
reviews.reviewText: Works nice and love the size of it, but the cost coating doesn't keep meat from sticking to it. Have to scrub so hard the copper comes off
This is a kitchen saver. It really works like an Airfryer and it is easy to clean and store.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice size and easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: This Gotham Steel Air Fryer Tray is as easy to clean as they say it is. I purchased the L and the XL sizes, and they work great if I need to use one at a time, or both at the same time. Cooks your food well. Great purchase!
It was exactly what we wanted. A small air fryer basket and tray which works great and is easy to wash and store.Food turns out crispy on the outside and tender on the inside.
Esta muy bien. Muy Agustí con la compra.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: Works well but damaged in post
reviews.reviewText: Does what it says on tin - excellent in actionHowever - this was poorly packaged and was crushed either in transit or in the warehouse - the mesh tray legs had been pressed very had against the base tray and left four dints in the tray, which now warps very easily
